ovdesc.p: This is a W type template which is used to define the selection criteria and the upload method that has to be used to upload SEAT.SCRIPTS

desc.p: The @id must be in the following format
This field is used to specify the different ways of script upload, they are VALIDATE, BULK.UPLOAD, SINGLE.UPLOAD and GENERATE.
Please refer to the user guide for additional information.
This is a mandatory field which is used to specify the selection criteria. The system will accept the following criteria.
Function of the script that is being uploaded.
Activated only when the field ACTION is set for SINGLE.UPLOAD
This is a no input field which holds the count of the selected active scripts based on the criteria given
Value based on the Criteria for selection. While inputting values for BASE.RELEASE, the start and End release has to be specified with a delimiter “-“ .(E.g. R05–R08)
